title: Structural and luminescence properties of novel Eu3+-doped Na3Ba2LaNb10O30 phosphors with high quantum efficiency and excellent color purity for w-LED applications
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29490-29504
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05026F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kanishk Poria, Sanjana Bhatia, Rajiv Kashyap, Vikas Kashyap, Isha Sihmar, Nisha Deopa, Jangvir Singh Shahi
In this study, we synthesized and characterized Eu3+-doped Na3Ba2LaNb10O30 phosphors for white LEDs using a high-temperature solid-state method, revealing strong red emissions and high luminescence efficiency.
